name: 2017 Phoenix Mid-Sized Retirement & Healthcare Plan Management Conference
content: Make plans now to join us in Phoenix in March of 2017! Reserve your seat early for an unparalleled educational and professional development experience. Rest assured that our 2017 conferences will maintain our hallmark characteristics: - A non-tradeshow environment that restricts registration exclusively to employers - 40+ workshops to choose from, covering the most critical retirement and health and welfare topics - Strategic, big-picture keynote sessions - Continuing education credits through HRCI, SHRM and World at Work, as well as CPEs for CPAs - Value-added, pre-conference sessions including Fiduciary Obligations Under ERISA, Self-Funding Workshop: Basic Concepts Through Advanced Strategies and Retirement Plan Check Up: Diagnostic Tools to Keep Your Plan at Optimal Performance - In-depth discussions addressing the full scope of regulatory, economic, demographic and communication issues that affect employee benefit plans - Ideas and solutions that provide immediate return on participantsâ€™ investment of time and money - Small group sessions promote idea sharing and real world case studies on topics such as wellness programs, specialty drugs, effective retirement plan committees, consumer-driven plans, private exchanges and more - Speakers that include leading industry professionals and consultants, fellow benefits practitioners, and top benefits attorneys
